title: Elementalist Ward
body: Can my friends gift me the elementalist ward since one of my good friends have the rp to do it but shes not sure if it could work so my question is can she gift me the elementalist ward?

replies.body: She can just gift you the rp for the bundle tho.

No, she cannot. Since the ward only comes in the bundle, and bundles are **not giftable**, you can only unlock the ward skin yourself.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
